content: The white, snowy cloths, the rich window-hangings, the warm tints of the walls, the sparkle of the fire in the steel grate, gave the room an air of elegance and cheerfulness.
translations: ita:Le bianche stoffe color neve, i ricchi tendaggi delle finestre, le calde tinte delle pareti, lo scintillio del fuoco nel
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Hybrid (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
